column3: “Wow, best sex of my life after this stuff! Great overall high, only down part is the scary dry eyes it's typically gives.”

“One of my favorites, especially if you plan to have sex while high on this. I think the only down fall for me is I get a headache after use of this more than any of the other neg.  effects, but its worth the good pounding down there for a little up there later.”

“A real nice strain that seems more like a Sativa than an Indica. Great for daytime use in moderation. Pretty hard hitter (for me) if I go with any more than 2 bingers. Even though it seemed to energize me, when it was time to go to sleep, no issues... indica properties seem to hit later... after an hour. Perhaps one of the best strains I've found for bedroom aerobics and naked lawn darts! Overall, I would give it a 9...”
“Great strain, especially if you're a fan of the diesels like I am. Felt effects after my first hit, and 3 his was enough to get me where I wanted to be”
“I did not enjoy this strain.  I was super high, but it made me too introspective and unsocial.  I still love blue dream the best.”
“I was orginally told by the person who supplied me this strain that it was called Yankee Doodle". Because it impacted me more like a pure sativa
column4: I didn't believe that it was in actuality Double D.  I didn't so much enjoy the flavor of this strain but gave it 5 stars based solely on it's high. It hit me hard and fast. Like nothing I've smoked before. Long lasting racing stoned. no impedement on cognative functions. ...”"

column3: “odd plant, went dwarf on me,but the bud is one I will always remember,really messes you up in the best way,amazing for fun early nights(wink wink)”

“Fantastic!!!

A nice change.........”
“Really great to get the head right for the day!”
“Very good Strain. Loved every bit of it.”
“must try”
“this strain is like a mental exercise. take this with yoga or any other relaxing activity. smoke this and face thyself.”
“Very powerful sativa. Big Bud x Viking x KC 636”

“I am smoking it right now and I am half way on a blunt and let me tell you I have been smoking bud since I been 16 years old and this shit got me high as hell love it... It took me a whole blunt to right this hahaha : )”
“Smoked all of it before i got to taste it. Very relaxing and calming ti the mind but, if you wanna do something that day...cancel it lol.”
“Very good vs PTSD”
“Gets you high asf. One of my fav strains”

“Got a bunch of this. Was alot like your old school stoned out budn amplified by 1000. They were all perfect little crystal covered buds. The smell was earthy and dank. Not a distinct smell like alot of buds now. The taste was similar, earthy dankness with some sweet notes. Definetly a nice bud to chill back on a sunday with, not great for getting things done.”
“Very unique find! Yes, great for intimate moments or just socializing with others.”
“Genetics: 100% Scandinavian Sativa x unknown”
“Like walking on sunshine”
“tguhu”
“Got this for my vape and love it.”
“Uplifting out of the spoon and heavy out of the bong”

“Pick this up for my first attempt of growing, and it has taken off in 3 three days under a 150 watt light. cant wait to see what happens next. I will for sure be back for more.

Thanks Green Lion Farms”
“gets you super stoned so if your down to chill and do nothing then this is for you. if you want to be in public it is an awkward high to have in public”
“Great day time meds!”
“Very uplifting”

“One of my favorites, especially if you plan to have sex while high on this. I think the only down fall for me is I get a headache after use of this more than any of the other neg.  effects, but its worth the good pounding down there for a little up there later.”
“Where would I be able to purchase or find this strain in Denver, co? I have my red card and would really like to try it because it'll help with my medical needs.”
“The best strain I've had. Very deep and chill, but focused.”
“This is overall one of my favorite strains!!  Great smeell and taste!!!”
“I love Green Lion Farms. I appreciate how professional and informative their descriptions are. So happy I found them.”
“Smoked all of it before i got to taste it. Very relaxing and calming ti the mind but, if you wanna do something that day...cancel it lol.”
